name: Sudoku Cube 3D
description:
Sudoku Cube 3D is a logic-based number placing game. This puzzle allows playing in 3D environment; where all sides represent a single Sudoku Grid (9x9). The game is a challenge for players who likes to solve puzzles as well as this Sudoku puzzle can be used as a learning curve for beginners. To complete the game, player must place all cubes in the right order to match the individual regions. Best time of completing the puzzle will be kept as a record.

Features:
• 3D Graphic Design
• Easy Navigation throughout of the game
• Levels suit all skills
• Different Options
• Sudoku Cube 3D is absolutely free
